entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend and companion of Harry's, also a witch.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard.

entities.name: godric’s hollow
entities.description: A location where Harry's parents died.

relationships.description: Voldemort expects Harry to return to the scene of his parents' deaths.
Hermione influences Harry's decision on when to set out for Godric’s Hollow.
